page.title: 01FARMS
page.content: {Sharmer farm and its surrounding {area.The land cover of the square at {02350262 is flat farm land mostly used {for crops other than grass.The fosse {way (old roman road) runs almost {diagonally across the square carrying {business traffic and private transport {in equal numbers.There are four houses {consisting of two farm houses a {bungalow and private house-Sharmer {house.the owners of lower fosse {farm(ref.252/62)have kept just 25acres {of land and breed miniature {dachshunds. { Sharmer farm(ref.359/624)consists of {120 acres of which 50 acres are used {to grow wheat,40 acres for barley and {the rest is divided into 10 acres for {silage,10 acres for hay and the rest {pasture.They keep about 60 beef cattle {a year which they buy from the market {at one year/18 mnths and keep for
